pages.text: $(item)Blue Steel$() is one of the two final alloys you can make in TFC. Similar to Black Steel, it follows an alloy recipe:$(br2)$(item)Weak Blue Steel:$()$(br2)$(thing)Black Steel:$() 50-55%$(br)$(thing)Steel:$() 20-25%$(br)$(thing)Bismuth Bronze:$() 10-15%$(br)$(thing)Sterling Silver:$() 10-15%

Alloy reference:$(br2)$(item)Sterling Silver:$()$(br2)$(thing)Copper:$() 20-40%$(br)$(thing)Silver:$() 60-80%$(br)$(item)$(item)Bismuth Bronze:$()$(2br)$(thing)Copper:$() 50-65%$(br)$(thing)Zinc:$() 20-30%$(br)$(thing)Bismuth:$() 10-20%$(br)$(item)Note: Sphalerite is Zinc.$()$(br2)
Weld a $(item)Weak Blue Steel Ingot$() and $(item) Black Steel$() to produce a $(thing)High Carbon Blue Steel Ingot$()
Work that ingot to make a Blue Steel ingot.
You can work a blue steel sheet into a blue steel bucket. The blue steel bucket is able to pick up and move lava sources, but not water. To move water, you need Red Steel.
